chapters.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Google Chrome Vulnerabilities

sentences.text: High
sentences.html: High

sentences.text: CVE-2022-1855 CVSS:8.8<crlf>Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free in Messaging. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service condition on the system.
sentences.html: CVE-2022-1855 CVSS:8.8 Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free in Messaging. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service condition on the system.

sentences.text: CVE-2022-1854 CVSS:8.8<crlf>Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free in ANGLE. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service condition on the system.
sentences.html: CVE-2022-1854 CVSS:8.8 Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free in ANGLE. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service condition on the system.

sentences.text: CVE-2022-1854 CVSS:8.8<crlf>Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper policy enforcement in File System API. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions.
sentences.html: CVE-2022-1854 CVSS:8.8 Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper policy enforcement in File System API. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions.

sentences.text: CVE-2022-1876 CVSS:5.4<crlf>Google Chrome is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking in DevTools. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code cause a denial of service condition on the system.
sentences.html: CVE-2022-1876 CVSS:5.4 Google Chrome is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking in DevTools. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code cause a denial of service condition on the system.

sentences.text: CVE-2022-1875 CVSS:4.3<crlf>Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper implementation in PDF. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information, and use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.
sentences.html: CVE-2022-1875 CVSS:4.3 Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper implementation in PDF. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information, and use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.
